original: Hydrocarbons, including coal and natural gas, have historically played a significant role in power generation. While coal has been a dominant source of energy, natural gas is increasingly preferred due to its cleaner-burning characteristics. In addition to electricity generation, hydrocarbons are essential for heating applications in both industrial and residential settings. Their efficiency and availability contribute to their status a
